languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины вытягивается по струнке, не обращая внимания на раны и ожоги, покрывающие лицо и тело.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, корабль отбит. Во всех отсеках мятежники разом утратили боевой дух, некоторые потеряли сознание, другие впали в шок или панику. Думаю, они почувствовали, что их презренный владыка мертв".
languages.translation_comment:
мастер дисциплины
прибегает мастер дисциплины с блюстителями

мастер дисциплины
прибегает мастер дисциплины с блюстителями

languages.text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины вытягивается по струнке, не обращая внимания на раны и ожоги, покрывающие лицо и тело.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, корабль отбит. Во всех отсеках мятежники разом утратили боевой дух, некоторые потеряли сознание, другие впали в шок или панику. Думаю, они почувствовали, что их презренный владыка мертв".

The mutineers have lost morale in all compartments at once, some have fainted, others have gone into shock or panic. I think they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas espera en posición firme, ignorando las heridas y quemaduras que marcan su cara y su cuerpo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, hemos asegurado la nave. Los amotinados de todos los compartimentos han perdido las ganas de luchar al unísono. Unos se han desmayado y otros están en estado de shock o en pánico. Creo que han sentido la muerte de su despreciable señor supremo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas espera en posición firme, ignorando las heridas y quemaduras que marcan su cara y su cuerpo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, hemos asegurado la nave. Los amotinados de todos los compartimentos han perdido las ganas de luchar al unísono. Unos se han desmayado y otros están en estado de shock o en pánico. Creo que han sentido la muerte de su despreciable señor supremo».

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは、彼女の顔と体を覆う傷と火傷などものともせず、直立不動で立っている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船は確保されました。全ての区画の暴徒が一斉に戦意を喪失しました。気絶した者もいれば、ショック状態やパニック状態に陥った者もいます。自分たちの卑劣な支配者が死んだことを感じ取ったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズは、彼女の顔と体を覆う傷と火傷などものともせず、直立不動で立っている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船は確保されました。全ての区画の暴徒が一斉に戦意を喪失しました。気絶した者もいれば、ショック状態やパニック状態に陥った者もいます。自分たちの卑劣な支配者が死んだことを感じ取ったのでしょう」

languages.text: {n}戒律大师立正站好，完全不在意脸上和身上的伤口和烧伤。{/n}“舰长大人，这艘船已经安全了。所有叛乱分子都在一瞬间失去了斗志，一部分人晕过去了，另一部分人陷入了震惊和恐慌之中。我相信，他们应该是感觉到他们邪恶的头目已经死了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师立正站好，完全不在意脸上和身上的伤口和烧伤。{/n}“舰长大人，这艘船已经安全了。所有叛乱分子都在一瞬间失去了斗志，一部分人晕过去了，另一部分人陷入了震惊和恐慌之中。我相信，他们应该是感觉到他们邪恶的头目已经死了。”

languages.text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms steht in Habachstellung. Sie ignoriert die Wunden und Verbrennungen, mit denen ihr Gesicht und ihr Körper übersät sind.{/n} "Lord Captain, das Schiff ist gesichert. Die Meuterer in sämtlichen Modulen haben alle zur gleichen Zeit ihren Kampfeswillen verloren. Einige sind in Ohnmacht gefallen, andere in einen Schockzustand oder in Panik verfallen. Sie haben wohl gespürt, dass ihr widerwärtiger Herr tot ist."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Master-at-Arms steht in Habachstellung. Sie ignoriert die Wunden und Verbrennungen, mit denen ihr Gesicht und ihr Körper übersät sind.{/n} "Lord Captain, das Schiff ist gesichert. Die Meuterer in sämtlichen Modulen haben alle zur gleichen Zeit ihren Kampfeswillen verloren. Einige sind in Ohnmacht gefallen, andere in einen Schockzustand oder in Panik verfallen. Sie haben wohl gespürt, dass ihr widerwärtiger Herr tot ist."

languages.text: {n}Ignorant les blessures et brûlures qui couvrent son visage et son corps, la capitaine d'armes se met au garde-à-vous.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le vaisseau a été sécurisé. Les mutins de tous les compartiments semblent avoir soudain perdu la volonté de se battre, et si certains ont perdu connaissance, d'autres sont entrés en état de choc ou pris de panique. Je suspecte qu'ils ont senti que leur misérable seigneur était mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignorant les blessures et brûlures qui couvrent son visage et son corps, la capitaine d'armes se met au garde-à-vous.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, le vaisseau a été sécurisé. Les mutins de tous les compartiments semblent avoir soudain perdu la volonté de se battre, et si certains ont perdu connaissance, d'autres sont entrés en état de choc ou pris de panique. Je suspecte qu'ils ont senti que leur misérable seigneur était mort. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, yüzünü ve bedenini kaplayan yaralarla yanıkları hiçe sayarak hazır olda duruyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gemi güvene alındı. Tüm kompartımanlardaki isyancılar, bir anda savaşma arzularını kaybetti. Bazıları bilincini yitirdi, bazılarıysa şoka girdi veya paniğe sürüklendi. Habis efendilerinin ölümünü hissettiklerine inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms stands at attention, ignoring the wounds and burns covering her face and body.{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel has been secured. The mutineers in all compartments have lost the will to fight all at once. Some have fainted while others have gone into shock or panic. I believe they sensed that their despicable overlord was dead."
